title: The Abandoned
description: There is a dark and isolated mansion, boarded-up and avoided, on a hill just beyond the town of Watch Point in New York's Hudson Valley. It has been abandoned too long and fallen into disrepair. It is called Harrow and it does not like to be ignored. But a new caretaker has come to harrow. he is fixing up the rooms and preparing the house for visitors ...
author: Douglas Clegg
